transcript.text: chapter 4 divine protection he and the
dwells in the secret place of the Most
High shall abide under the shadow of the
almighty I will say of Yahweh he is my
refuge and my fortress my yah in him
will I trust surely he shall deliver you
from the snare of the Fowler and from
the noise and pestilence he shall cover
you with his feathers and under his wing
shall you trust his truth shall be your
shield and buckler you shall not be
afraid for the terror by night nor the
arrow that flies by day nor for the
pestilence that walks in darkness nor
for the destruction that wastes at
noonday a Thousand shall fall at your
side and ten thousand at your right hand
but it shall not come near you only with
your eyes shall you behold and see the
reward of the wicked because you've made
Yahweh which is my refuge even the most
high your habitation there shall no evil
befall you neither shall any plague come
near your dwelling for he shall give his
angels charge over you to keep you in
all your ways they shall bear you up in
their hands lest you dash your foot
against a stone you shall tread upon the
lion and adder the young line and the
dragon shall you trample under feet
because he has set his love upon me
therefore will I deliver him I will set
him on high because he is known my name
he shall call upon me and I will answer
him I will be with him in trouble I will
deliver him and honor him with long life
will i satisfy him and show him my
salvation psalm 91 and I saw another
angel ascending from the east having the
seal of the Living Elohim and he cried
with a loud voice to the four angels to
whom it was given to hurt the earth in
the sea saying hurt not the earth either
the sea nor the trees so we have sealed
the servants of our Elohim and their
foreheads and I heard the number of them
which were sealed and there were sealed
a hundred and forty and four thousand of
all the tribes of the children of Israel
revelation 7 verses two through four
as we ponder the dark days the
tribulation before us many of us wonder
who the hundred and forty-four thousand
will be this select group of people are
sealed in such a way that they at the
very least escape much of his
destructive harm that will pummel the
planet I think it most most of us were
honest with ourselves we would all admit
that we have a desire to be a part of
this group after all who wouldn't want
to evangelizing the terrors of the Great
Tribulation while escaping the death and
torture but following the people of the
world but the reason I started this
chapter quoting Psalm 91 is because of a
verse that I believe is the most
important in the entire chapter because
he has set his love upon me therefore
will I deliver him I will set him on
high because he is known my name
although I do not know who all the
individuals are who will make up 144,000
I do know one characteristic people all
possess they will set their hearts their
love upon Yahshua I'm not just talking
about loving yah with all our heart soul
mind and strength this should be the
quality of every believer but I'm
talking about the difference between a
merry love and a Martha life but both
women adore Yahshua Martha busied
herself preparing things while Mary
contented herself was sitting at the
feet of her master gazing up into his
eyes holding on to each word he spoke as
if it were the last we know the
disciples love Yahshua yet only one the
Apostle jochen on is singled out as the
beloved apostle or the one whom Yahshua
loved only he was found time and time
again pressing his face into yahshua's
chest a childlike abandonment of love if
ever there was one I have a radical
thought perhaps the best way to become
part of a future band of 144,000 is to
set her love upon the lover of your soul
hanging upon his every word
gazing into his eyes waiting on him
spending time with him imagine the
clouds of thick incense rising from the
altar of the holy place Moshe his eyes
went with tears silently moves his mouth
as he lays out face first before the
altar the presence of Yahweh deepens
pouring over this most humble man yet as
he rises from the floor gripping his
polished wooden staff and departs the
tabernacle he leaves someone behind
Joshua the young man many years younger
than mo Shane still presses his face to
the floor unwilling to leave the sweet
presence of his creator muttered
whispers and rolling eyes the crowds
those outside will wonder why this young
man stays in the tent long after their
leader has emerged some probably sigh
out that Joshua's to heavenly minded to
be any earthly good but the young man
before the altar doesn't care his love
is set on the most time he wants more of
ya he wants a far more and he won't jump
up and leave until he has spent as much
time with yah as he possibly can so
whatever is divine protection evidently
these 144,000 are protected in ways that
are not afforded everyone else on the
earth what does this divine protection
look like I'm sure we've all either
experienced or heard stories of Yahweh
intervening in miraculous ways some of
these tales are more amazing than others
I have one that I would like to share it
was still a few months before my 18th
birthday my cheap 4-door jump card
broken down the day before so my dad had
graciously allowed me to drive his
gleaming white Toyota mini truck until I
could get my car to the shop after
working a busy shift at the local
supermarket i raved late i arrived late
to a saturday night church meeting of
praise and worship after the service i
climbed with my dad's truck to head home
the Texas late winter Twilight faded to
diffuse
red gold pink and purple on the western
horizon balmy and warm the air gave
ample warning of the mild winter would
soon give way to the hot and humid
summer skipping spring altogether as I
drove home the fading evening quickly
dissolved into a star prick night and a
fat moon poured its lunar ambience
across the rolling hills of central
texas I drove at 70 miles per hour the
legal speed limit for this stretch of
state highway just north of Austin the
thump of the road beneath the tires only
made me feel carefree even lazy as I
humped in the radio ignoring a passing
car on the opposite lane was flashing
his lights at me the highway curved in
the left around a squat blue water tank
that gleams silver of the moonlight just
around the curve I noticed something
very wrong the unmistakable twin pools
of car headlights peered into my eyes a
car going the wrong way in my lane
barrel toward me I had no chance to
swerve out of the way no chance to even
scream I only remember as the two
headlights careens toward me thinking
one thing well that was a nice life the
headlights disappeared into blackness as
the crunching of metal drowned out all
other sounds my body flung toward the
windshield held back only by the strain
chords of the seatbelt blackness metal
not just crunching but shrinking and
protest as if the entire universe were
constructed of steel I'm floating around
me gaming it at all sides
than another sound a sound the swallow
team of the shooting metal the thumping
beat of hundreds if not thousands of
wings not tiny bird wings but massive
thick strong wings flapping furiously
around me moments later I blinked open
my eyes I still sat in the truck fresh
clods of Earth coated the windshield
peering through the glass I could see
that I was on the side of the road off
the highway I shoved open the mangled
driver side door and staggered from the
truck the moon still plump and white
revealed my dad's truck as a twisted
metal ball the adrenaline the corset on
body temporarily covered the throbbing
of my broken right wrist I shouted out
to the sky what happened what happened
the strobe blue red white lights of
emergency vehicles slashed the night as
I approached a medic repeating my
question the man frowned at me please
were trying to attend to a head-on
collision you need to get back into your
car sir pointing back to my dad's deform
truck I cried out that's my car I was in
the accident later that night as an
ambulance whisked me south of downtown
Austin I would learn from a shock
paramedic the details of what had
happened an old woman driving with her
granddaughter had forgotten to put her
contacts into her eyes she crossed over
the double yellow line going 70 miles
per hour she hit me head-on with a total
collision force of a hundred and forty
miles per hour the paramedic and
whispered tones said he had never seen
anyone survive such an accident the
grandmother had sustained a broken jaw
due to a punch from her airbag her
granddaughter in the backseat had
escaped all harm I had a lacerated chin
and broken wrists that would heal him
three weeks to this day every couple of
years or so I will get a subtle pain in
my right wrist a reminder of that night
as i rub my wrist i am thankful for abba
giving me this lifelong memorial what
happened was never a question in my mind
abba had dispatched hundreds if not
thousands of angels to protect
and the other two people involved on the
accident I had at the young age of 17
experience divine protection but there
is a deeper point to the story shortly
after that traumatic night I would begin
the slow change of giving up on all my
hopes and dreams on becoming a famous
screenwriter in Hollywood and instead
devote myself to evangelism with a
fervency I used the last few months of
my senior year in high school to witness
I had through His divine protection
learn to start truly setting my love
upon him this is what is needed in the
hour of a great tribulation we are to
love not our lives unto death we are two
totally abandon ourselves to him we are
to lovingly adore and wait upon him
giving everything we are to the one who
delivers us from all evil we are to
simply put trust under the shadow of his
loving wings
